variable_label: Classifier name: Allelic imbalance, Clinical data, Fragment endpoints, Fragment lengths, Pan-feature (Validation only), SCNA, SCNA-WBC, SNV, SNV-WBC, WG methylation
Training or Validation set: train, valid
Training set cross-validation fold: 1-10, Validation set fold = 0
Clinical stage: Non-cancer, I, II, III, IV, and Non-informative.  For cases with multiple primaries the highest stage is reported.
Score cutoff for calling cancer (p_cancer >= score_cutoff)
